means: 放荡的人，浪子，肆意挥霍者

sentence.Network_en: Their profligate lifestyle resulted in bankruptcy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们挥霍的生活方式导致的破产.

sentence.Network_en: This young man had all the inclination to be a profligate of the first water.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个青年完全有可能成为十足的浪子.

sentence.Network_en: Similarly Americans have been profligate in the handling of mineral resources.
sentence.Network_cn: 同样的,美国在处理矿产资源方面亦多浪费.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... profile 侧面像,轮廓 profligate 恣意,放荡的 profuse 浪费的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... procreate 生育 profligate 浪费的,挥霍的 proliferate 繁殖,增殖.
profligacy 放荡profligate 放荡的profound 深刻的
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... profiteer 奸商，牟取暴利者 profligate 挥金如土的；n.挥霍者 profuse 很多的；浪费的.

list.abs: Their profligate lifestyle resulted in bankruptcy ., 他们挥霍的生活方式导致的破产.
Why do you bring your profligate companions here ?, 为什么你要把你那些酒肉朋友带到这里来呢?
Their profligate lifestyle resulted in bankruptcy ., 他们挥霍的生活方式导致的破产.
More irksome still is that profligate America is able to borrow on better terms ., 使人恼怒的是 , 肆意挥霍的美国还能进行更为划算的借贷.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'overthrown, routed'): from Latin profligatus 'dissolute', past participle of profligare 'overthrow, ruin', from pro- 'forward, down' + fligere 'strike down'

entry.def: Someone who is profligate spends too much money or uses too much of something.

example.ex: ...the most profligate consumer of energy in the world.
example.tran: 世界上能源挥霍最严重的国家

means.word_mean: 1. a dissolute man in fashionable society

auth_sentence.content: Duff was a brilliant intellect and a profligate seducer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Duff was a brilliant intellect and a profligate seducer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Duff was a brilliant intellect and a profligate seducer.

auth_sentence.content: Compared with Ferrante, Thomas Pynchon is a publicity profligate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Compared with Ferrante, Thomas Pynchon is a publicity profligate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Compared with Ferrante, Thomas Pynchon is a publicity profligate.

auth_sentence.content: Germans have alternated between periods of profligate borrowing and staunch purism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Germans have alternated between periods of profligate borrowing and staunch purism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Germans have alternated between periods of profligate borrowing and staunch purism.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"赞同,亲…"; 2. 也有"代替"之意; 3. 表示"向前,在前;预先"; 4. 表示"很多…"

stems_affixes.word_buile: pro赞同,亲…+American美国的, 美洲的→adj.亲美的
pro赞同,亲…+slavery奴隶制→adj.赞成奴隶制的
pro=pro向前,在前;预先+ig=act做→做在前面,做得多→大量的
pro向前,在前;预先+fici做+ent……的→做在[别人] 前面→精通
pro向前,在前;预先+min小,伸+ent……的→向前伸出的小部分→杰出的
pro向前,在前;预先+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
pro很多…+flig打出+ate……的→把钱不断的打出去→挥霍的
pro很多…+fuse流→流很多→大量的
pro很多…+lif+ic……的→带来东西→多产的
pro很多…+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
pro代替+louct说+or人→n. 议长;代言人
pro代替+noun名词→n.代名词
pro向前+blem抛→抛出问题
pro向前,在前;预先+cliv倾斜+ity表名词→向前倾斜
pro向前,在前;预先+fil线条+e→前面的线条
pro向前,在前;预先+gress走→向前走
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+logue说→在前面说→前言
pro向前,在前;预先+spect看→向前看→前景
pro很多…+fit=fic做→做很多→做得好→利润
pro向前,在前;预先+cure关心→关心在前→[想要]获得
pro向前,在前;预先+fess说→在前面说坦白
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+long长→向前拉长→延长
pro向前,在前;预先+mot动+e→向前动→促进
pro向前,在前;预先+pel推→向前推
pro向前,在前;预先+secu追随+te→追随到[法院]前面→检举;指控
pro向前,在前;预先+trud推,突出+e→向前突出
pro向前,在前;预先+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
pro很多…+crastin明天+ate表动词→有许多明天明日复明日→拖延
pro很多…+create创造→创造很多→生儿育女
pro很多…+lifer=fer带来+ate表动词→带来很多生命→繁殖
